visual_enhancers.patterns: Use subtle Islamic geometric patterns as background overlays with 5% opacity

layout_strategy.navigation: Bottom Navigation Bar (Dashboard, Calendar, Shopping, Settings)

calendar_view.week: Horizontal Date Strip (Top) + Vertical Agenda List (Bottom) - NO BIG TILES

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'Outfit' font family if possible or use Google Fonts import.
Refactor 'Week View' to use a Vertical Agenda Layout. DO NOT use grid tiles for week view.
Implement 'Bulk Add' in Shopping List using a textarea that splits by newline.
Use 'react-day-picker' modifiers to show colored dots for events in Month View.
Ensure 'Green' (#047857) is strictly for HOSTING events.
Ensure 'Gold' (#D97706) is strictly for INVITED events.
Use 'Vaul' drawer for adding events/items on mobile.
Maintain the 'Warm Sand' background to avoid harsh white glare.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.design_philosophy: Functional Spirituality. Clean, legible, but warm.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.motion: Use subtle fade-ins (framer-motion) for page transitions. No bounce or excessive spring.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES.accessibility: Ensure text contrast on Gold backgrounds is sufficient (use dark text on gold if needed).
